properties.description: This has 2 Pipelines to Process the data. 1. Ingest Data from TXT file to Snowflake RAW Tables and 2. Transform the data from RAW Tables and load to the final business tables.

activities.name: Get_file_details
activities.description:
Check meta data of blobs on location  - 
khc-enterprise-data/sales/kroger/raw

activities.name: FE_file_count_loop
activities.description: This loop counts the number of files, provided by get_file_details activity, and update the variable whose value will be used by Switch later

activities.name: post_pre_cnt
activities.description: This activity is counting the number of files available in raw folder. For comp_weekly_pos incrementing with 1 and for comp_ad_weekly_pos incrementing with 2. These values are used by Switch to determine ADF_Trigger Names

activities.name: post_file_cnt
activities.description: This activity is counting the number of files available in raw folder.

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart_Snowflake
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_03
activities.description: This activity logs success of Get File detials activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_05
activities.description: This activity logs success of SW_Set_Trigger activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_04
activities.description: This activity logs success of FE_file_count_loop activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_09
activities.description: This activity logs success of IF_create_trigger_file_for_extraction_process activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Pipelinesuccesful_master_pool_load
activities.description: This activity logs is the success of PL_KHCDE_KROGER_MASTER_POOL_LOAD pipeline activity in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Get_kroger_app_orchestration_metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of raw folder from khc_ingestion_metadata table.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name='@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and data_level=1 and active_ind = 'y' and parent_id='kroger_1'

activities.name: SP-Failure_01
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Get_Row_folder_location activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_02
activities.description: This activity logs failure of DL-Trigger activity in  khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Get_file_details activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_04
activities.description: This activity logs failure of FE_file_count_loop in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_05
activities.description: This activity logs failure of SW_Set_Trigger in table khc_audit_log_detail activity and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_09
activities.description: This activity logs failure of IF_create_trigger_file_for_extraction_process activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_01
activities.description: This activity logs success of  Get_Row_folder_location activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_02
activities.description: This activity logs success of DL-Trigger activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Get_dataset_group
activities.description: This activity pulls the dataset group based on adf_trigger variable.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select application_name,dataset_group,max(parameter_json) as parameter_json from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name='@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and adf_trigger_name in @{variables('adf_trigger_ name')} and active_ind = 'y' group by application_name,dataset_group order by dataset_group desc

activities.name: SP-Success_06
activities.description: This activity logs success of Get_dataset_group in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_06
activities.description: This activity logs failure of IF_set_trigger table khc_audit_log_detail activity in  and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: GMDetails-Trigger
activities.description: Get Metadata for fetching blob_trigger_name

activities.name: IF-GMDetails-Output-Exists
activities.description: If blob_trigger_name exists, then delete the file

ifTrueActivities.name: DL-Trigger
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity deletes the trigger file from location sales/triggers.

activities.name: CP-CreateDBTTrigger
activities.description: Created Trigger file after DBT processing

activities.name: SW-Set_Trigger
activities.description: Switch to set ADF_Trigger_Name based on Daily Files(Switch-Default), Weekly Comp POS(Switch-1) and Weekly Comp POS Ad Week(Switch-2)

activities.name: set_trigger_name_weekly
activities.description: This activity set the trigger name as kroger_weekly based on the file count.

activities.name: set_trigger_name_weekly_adweek
activities.description: This activity set the trigger name as kroger_comp_pos_ad_weekly based on the file count.

defaultActivities.name: set_trigger_name_daily
defaultActivities.description: This activity set the trigger name as kroger_daily based on the file count.

activities.name: FE_dataset_group_loop
activities.description: This loop runs SFK and DBT for each dataset group

activities.name: EP-SnowflakeIngestion
activities.description: This activity executes the SnowflakeIngestion pipeline based on values received from LU_Metadata activity.

activities.name: EP-DBT_Processing
activities.description: This activity executes the DBTProcessing  pipeline based on values received from LU-Metadata_DBTProcessing activity.

activities.name: SP-Success_08
activities.description: This activity logs success of EP-DBT_Processing activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_07
activities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-SnowflakeIngestion activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_08
activities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-DBT_Processing activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_07
activities.description: This activity logs success of EP-SnowflakeIngestion activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.
